Kabbalah

keep on

keep sb under

keep sth quiet

keep sth to yourself
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g keep to sth

keep your end up

e_id="13cbac01393.-325"><title eid="main_h1_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-324" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="44" status="1">main</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">major</und> â—‡ <und e_id="13cbac01393.-31c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These words all describe sb/sth that is the largest or most important of its kind.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä»¥ä¸Šå„è¯å‡ç”¨ä»¥å½¢å®¹ä¸»è¦çš„ã€æœ€é‡è¦çš„äººæˆ–äº‹ç‰©ã€‚</chn></und></p><ul eid="main_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac01393.-31b"><li eid="main_li_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-31a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>main</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> largest or most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡ä¸»è¦çš„ã€æœ€é‡è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-318"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_7"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-316" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">Be careful crossing the main road.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>è¿‡å¤§é©¬è·¯æ—¶å°å¿ƒç‚¹ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_8"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-314" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">The main thing is to remain calm.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯è¦ä¿æŒå†·é™ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="main_li_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-313" e_inline="y"><unsyn>major</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:ubn">usually before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> very large or important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡ä¸»è¦çš„ã€é‡è¦çš„ã€å¤§çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_3" e_id="13cbac01393.-311"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_9"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-30f" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">He played a major role in setting up the system.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä»–åœ¨å»ºç«‹è¿™ä¸ªç³»ç»Ÿçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­èµ·äº†ä¸»è¦çš„ä½œç”¨ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-30e"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Major</eb>  is most often used after <ei eid="main_ei_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-30c">a</ei> with a singular noun, or no article with a plural noun. When it is used with <ei eid="main_ei_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-30b">the</ei> or <ei eid="main_ei_3" e_id="13cbac01393.-30a">my/your/his/her/our/their</ei> it means 'the largest or most important'.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>major æœ€å¸¸ç”¨äºä¸å®šå† è¯ a ä¹‹åï¼Œä¸å•æ•°åè¯è¿ç”¨ï¼›æˆ–ä¸ç”¨å† è¯ï¼Œä¸å¤æ•°åè¯è¿ç”¨ã€‚major ä¸ the æˆ– my/your/his/her/our/their è¿ç”¨æ—¶æ„ä¸ºæœ€ä¸»è¦çš„ã€æœ€é‡è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_4" e_id="13cbac01393.-309"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_10"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-307" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">Our major concern here is combatting poverty.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ€å…³å¿ƒçš„æ˜¯è§£å†³è´«ç©·é—®é¢˜ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"> In this meaning it is only used to talk about ideas or worries that people have, not physical things, and it is also more formal than  <eb>main</eb>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>åœ¨è¯¥å«ä¹‰ä¸­ major åªç”¨ä»¥æŒ‡äººçš„æƒ³æ³•æˆ–æ‹…å¿§ï¼Œè€Œéç‰©è´¨çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œä¸”è¾ƒ main æ­£å¼</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_5" e_id="13cbac01393.-305"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_11"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><wx eid="main_wx_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-303">Be careful crossing the major road.</wx></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_12"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><wx eid="main_wx_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-301">The major thing is to remain calm.</wx></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-300" e_inline="y"><unsyn>key</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:ubn">usually before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> most important; essential<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡æœ€é‡è¦çš„ã€ä¸»è¦çš„ã€å…³é”®çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_6" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fe"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_13"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fc" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">He was a key figure in the campaign.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä»–æ˜¯è¿™åœºè¿åŠ¨çš„å…³é”®äººç‰©ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fb"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Key</eb>  is used most frequently in business and political contexts. It can be used to talk about ideas, or the part that sb plays in a situation, but not physical things. It is slightly more informal than  <eb>major</eb>, especially when used after a noun and linking verb.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>key æœ€å¸¸ç”¨äºå•†åŠ¡å’Œæ”¿æ²»è¯­å¢ƒï¼Œå¯ç”¨æ¥å½¢å®¹æƒ³æ³•æˆ–æŸäººåœ¨æŸæƒ…åŠ¿ä¸‹èµ·çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼Œè€Œéç‰©è´¨çš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€‚key è¾ƒ major ç¨éæ­£å¼ï¼Œç”¨äºåè¯åŠ è¿ç³»åŠ¨è¯åå°¤å…¶å¦‚æ­¤</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f8"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_14"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f6" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">Speed is key at this point.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™é€Ÿåº¦æ˜¯å…³é”®ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f5" e_inline="y"><unsyn>central</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡æœ€é‡è¦çš„ã€é¦–è¦çš„ã€ä¸»è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f2"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_15"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_13" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f0" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">The central issue is that of widespread racism.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æœ€é‡è¦çš„é—®é¢˜æ˜¯ç§æ—ä¸»ä¹‰æ³›æ»¥ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ef"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag>  <eb>Central</eb>  is used in a similar way to  <eb>key</eb>, but is more formal. It is most frequently used in the phrase <ei eid="main_ei_5" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ec">sth is central to sth else</ei>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>central ä¸ key ç”¨æ³•ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œä½†æ›´æ­£å¼ï¼Œæœ€å¸¸ç”¨äº be central to çŸ­è¯­ä¸­ã€‚</chn></un></li><li eid="main_li_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2eb" e_inline="y"><unsyn>principal</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡æœ€é‡è¦çš„ã€ä¸»è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e8"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_16"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_14" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e6" e_inline="y" tranID="22" status="6">The principal reason for this omission is lack of time.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>è·³è¿‡å®ƒçš„ä¸»è¦åŸå› æ˜¯æ—¶é—´ä¸è¶³ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e5"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Principal</eb>  is mostly used for statements of fact about which there can be no argument. To state an opinion, or to try to persuade sb of the facts as you see them, it is more usual to use  <eb>key</eb>  or  <eb>central</eb>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>principal ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºé™ˆè¿°æ— å¯äº‰è¾©çš„äº‹å®ã€‚è¡¨æ˜æ„è§æˆ–è¯´æœåˆ«äººç›¸ä¿¡ä½ æ‰€è§åˆ°çš„äº‹å®ï¼Œè¾ƒå¸¸ç”¨ key æˆ– central</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e1"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_17"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_15" e_id="13cbac01393.-2df" e_inline="y" tranID="24" status="6">The key/central issue here isâ€¦<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>è¿™é‡Œçš„å…³é”®é—®é¢˜æ˜¯â€¦</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2de" e_inline="y"><unsyn>chief</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡æœ€é‡è¦çš„ã€é¦–è¦çš„ã€ä¸»è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2db"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_18"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_16" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d9" e_inline="y" tranID="26" status="6">Unemployment was the chief cause of poverty.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å¤±ä¸šæ˜¯è´«ç©·çš„ä¸»è¦åŸå› ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="main_li_13" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d8" e_inline="y"><unsyn>prime</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important; to be considered first<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡ä¸»è¦çš„ã€é¦–è¦çš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d5"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_19"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="main_x_17" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d3" e_inline="y" tranID="28" status="6">My prime concern is to protect my property.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘æœ€å…³å¿ƒçš„æ˜¯ä¿æŠ¤è‡ªå·±çš„è´¢äº§ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="main_h3_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d2" e_inline="y" tranID="54" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="main_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d1"><li eid="main_li_14" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d0" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a/the main/major/key/central/principal/chief/prime  <eb>aim/concern</eb> </und></li><li eid="main_li_15" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ce" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a/the main/major/principal  <eb>road/town/city</eb> </und></li><li eid="main_li_16" e_id="13cbac01393.-2cc" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">the main/key  <eb>thing</eb>  is toâ€¦</und></li><li eid="main_li_17" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ca" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">to be  <eb>of</eb>  major/key/central/prime  <eb>importance</eb> </und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></subentry-g></div>

kick off sth

kick off (with sth)

kick (some/sb's) ass

kick-turn

kick up

kid

kill an hour, a couple of hours, etc.

kill yourself laughing
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-2daa" eid="kill_idmg_6"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-2da8" eid="kill_idm_7"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-2da8">â—</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-2da8" eid="kill_idm_7"><xhtml:a href="xi:kill">ËŒkill</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:yourself">yourself</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:laughing">Ëˆlaughing</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kill_sngs_7"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kill_sng_10" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-2da4" geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:laugh">laugh</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:lot">lot</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>ç¬‘å¾—å‰ä»°ååˆï¼›ç¬‘ç ´è‚šçš®</chn></def><x-gs eid="kill_xgs_6"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-2da1" eid="kill_xg_15"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-2da1">â—†</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="kill_rxg_13" g href="kill_rxg_13" resource="recx" source="ald9" targeteltid="13cba888321.1963"><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.1f34c209.141c12ef5c9.61f2" eid="kill_x_15" status="6" tranid="25" wd="He was killing himself laughing."><xhtml:a href="x:He">He</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:was">was</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:killing">killing</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:himself">himself</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:laughing">laughing</xhtml:a>.  <xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>ä»–ç¬‘å¾—å‰ä»°ååˆã€‚</chn></x><a href="snd://_kill__gbs_12.spx"><audio-gb-liju>ğŸ”Š</audio-gb-liju></a><xaudio eid="kill_xaudio_26" geo="n_am" name="_kill__ams_12"></xaudio></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://kill">kill</a></div>

Kilmarnock

kind of

kindred

king-size

ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment </chnsep><chn>ç”¨ equipment è¿˜æ˜¯ materialï¼Ÿ</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large knick-knack

knit

knock-on
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="knockon_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-15b5">knock-on</h><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-15b3"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-15b2"></infl><pron-gs eid="knockon_prongs_1" psg="ald8_knockon_prongs_1" source="gl2018" eid="knockon_audio_1" name="knock_on#1_gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://knock_on_1_gb_1.spx"><audio-gb>ğŸ”Š</audio-gb></a></pron-g-blk><pron-g-blk><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><namelabel><xhtml:a href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ËŒnÉ‘Ëk ËˆÉ‘Ën</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="knockon_audio_2" name="knock_on#1_us_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a know best

know better (than that/than to do sth)
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g eid="know_idmg_10"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-12b2" eid="know_idm_10"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-12b2">â—</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-12b2" know sb/sth inside out

know sth as well as I do

knuckle
